description:
These shoes offer a welcome combination of hiking support and climbing nimbleness. The to-the-toe lacing can be eased off for comfortable walking on the approach or snugged up for precision when edging or toeing in on steeper terrain.

  • Durable 1.6mm suede leather upper with a full rubber rand for abrasion resistance
  • Lacing right down to the toes for a precise fit
  • Salewa 3F System connects the instep with the sole and heel for a supportive, flexible fit
  • Insoles are mid-stiff nylon
  • Cushioning OrthoLite footbed wicks away moisture to keep your feet cool
  • Outsoles are Vibram MTN Trainer Evo for traction, secure footing and firm support
name: Salewa MS Mountain Trainer 2 Light Trail Shoes - Men's
